Marie, Lead Communication & Marketing : après 3 ans chez CMI France sur le poste de Responsable de la Communication, elle rejoint Elevate en 2022.
Elle mène, avec Aurélien, le co-fondateur d’Elevate, la communication digitale externe & interne de l’agence ainsi que la partie évènementielle !
Si tu cherches une experte de couture (ouverte, rabattue simple, rabattue double, avec lisières superposées ou surjetée normale) Marie est LA personne à qui t’adresser. Coco Chanel ou Yves Saint-Laurent peuvent aller se rhabiller ! 🦸 ♀️
— Le processus de recrutement
🔎 Entretien de découverte : un échange avec notre équipe Talent, conçu pour te donner l’occasion de te présenter et de mieux te connaître.📚 Entretien technique : une rencontre avec une personne de l’équipe Marketing, incluant un test de compétences et des mises en situations.🎯 Entretien final : une discussion approfondie avec l’un des co-fondateurs de l’agence. Cet entretien vise à évaluer tes capacités de structuration, d’analyse et de synthèse à travers une ou deux études de cas.
— Pourquoi nous rejoindre ?
Elevate c’est avant tout ⛺Rejoindre un cabinet de conseil à taille humaine.Une entreprise fondée autour de la formation et la montée en compétences de chaque membre de l’équipe.Un management humain et respectueux de toutes et tous.De la place pour les initiatives innovantes et créatives.Une politique de télétravail flexible et basée sur le choix !Des parcours de carrières adaptés à chacun.esDes bureaux en plein Paris 🇫🇷
— Nos équipes témoignent 🤝
Nous avons à cœur d’écouter, valoriser et respecter l’avis de nos Elevaters. Nous vous encourageons à lire les avis de chacun et chacune sur notre page Glassdoor pour avoir plus de détails sur les coulisses de notre aventure 🙂
Notre page Glassdoor : https://www.glassdoor.fr/Pr%C3%A9sentation/Travailler-chez-Elevate-Agency-EI_IE4481244.16,30.htm

Chez Elevate, nous valorisons la diversité et l’inclusion. Handi Accueillante, Elevate développe une politique active d’emploi et d’insertion des personnes en situation de handicap. Nous encourageons toutes les candidatures et garantissons un processus de recrutement dénué de toutes formes de discriminations. Par ailleurs, si vous avez besoin d’un dispositif spécial à l’emploi (situation de handicap) ou d’une autorisation de travail sur le territoire français, faites-nous en part le plus tôt possible pour que les démarches administratives ne ralentissent pas votre arrivée chez nous !

description.text:
Our company has a vision to change people’s mood for the better. And our mission is to be a fast moving, highly efficient, tech services company that engages people, partners & players and gives them great experiences.
We work with a range of global client brands - are we are in “scale up” mode, hiring the best and most highly motivated, fast working, bureaucracy hating, “I want to win but I’m not afraid to fail…”, team players. We provide B2B support services to multiple technology and gaming partners, we believe in the free market, and want to hear from the best of the best.
We are seeking a highly skilled and experienced CRM Specialist to join our dynamic team. The ideal candidate will have a deep understanding of customer relationship management strategies and tools, and a proven track record in enhancing customer engagement and retention within the online iGaming industry.
Key Responsibilities:
Develop and Execute CRM Strategies:Design, implement, and optimize CRM campaigns to enhance customerengagement, loyalty, and lifetime value.Collaborate with the marketing and analytics teams to identify customersegments and tailor campaigns accordingly.Customer Data Management:Manage and analyze customer data to derive insights and improve the effectiveness of CRM campaigns.Ensure data integrity and compliance with relevant regulations (e.g., GDPR).Campaign Management:Plan and execute multi-channel campaigns (email, SMS, push notifications, etc.)to engage and retain customers.Monitor and report on the performance of CRM campaigns, providing insightsand recommendations for improvement.Customer Journey Mapping:Develop and maintain detailed customer journey maps to understand andenhance the customer experience.Implement automation workflows to streamline customer interactions and createengagement cycles tailored to player behavior.Identify key touchpoints and develop strategies to optimize each stage of thecustomer lifecycle.Gamification:Integrate gamification techniques into CRM strategies to boost customerengagement and loyalty.Develop and manage gamified experiences such as points, badges,leaderboards, and challenges into the CRM platform to encourage participationand reward engagement.Monitor and analyze the impact of gamification on customer behavior andcampaign effectiveness, making data-driven improvements as necessary.
Loyalty Programs:Design and manage customer loyalty programs to incentivize repeat businessand increase customer retention.Analyze the effectiveness of loyalty programs and make data-driven adjustmentsas needed.
**While these responsibilities outline the primary focus areas, this role may also involve other tasks to support evolving business needs.
Qualifications:
Education:Bachelor’s degree in Marketing, Business Administration, or a related field. Amaster’s degree is a plus.Experience:Minimum of 1-2 years of experience in a CRM role, preferably within the onlinecasino or iGaming industry.Proven experience in managing CRM campaigns and customer loyalty programs.Technical Skills:Analytical skills with the ability to interpret data and generate actionable insights.Familiarity with email marketing platforms and marketing automation tools.Soft Skills:Excellent communication and interpersonal skills.Strong project management and organizational skills.Ability to work independently and collaboratively in a fast-paced environment.Comfortable with changes in priorities and plans.English working environment.
Desirable Skills:Knowledge of the online casino and iGaming industry.Experience with segmentation and personalization techniques.Understanding of regulatory requirements related to customer data and marketingcommunications.
Why Join Us:Be part of a fast-growing, innovative company with a clear vision and mission.Work in a dynamic, collaborative environment that values speed, clarity, and decisiveness.Take ownership of a critical role with the opportunity to make a significant impact on the business.Join a team of highly motivated, talented professionals who are passionate about delivering exceptional experiences.
About SixValuesOur vision is to elevate people's moods everywhere, making every interaction more engaging, rewarding, and memorable. Through cutting-edge technology and a real commitment to excellence, we aim to revolutionize how people connect with digital experiences and transform the world of betting and gaming technology.Our mission is simple yet ambitious: to be a fast-moving, highly efficient tech company that brings joy and excitement to players by delivering top-tier solutions for operators. From website and application development to data analytics and payment systems, everything we do is designed to create seamless, thrilling experiences for our partners and their customers.

description.text:
About the Client
We are sourcing on behalf of a boutique recruitment company based in Dubai that prides itself on delivering high-touch, efficient, and tailored hiring solutions. As the team continues to grow, they’re looking for a proactive and detail-oriented Virtual Assistant to help streamline operations, manage day-to-day admin tasks, and support candidate coordination. This is a great opportunity to work behind the scenes with a close-knit team that values precision, professionalism, and people-first service.
About the Role
This Virtual Assistant position is designed to provide comprehensive remote administrative, organizational, and communication support to a recruitment firm operating in Dubai. The role is suitable for professionals at the mid-level who are adept at managing a variety of business tasks using digital tools and platforms. The Virtual Assistant will play a pivotal role in ensuring the smooth operation of daily recruitment activities, supporting consultants and management, and maintaining high standards of professionalism and efficiency. The position requires working hours aligned with the UAE business day (9:00 AM to 5:00 PM Gulf Standard Time), offering flexibility in location while demanding reliability and responsiveness during these hours.
Key Responsibilities
Manage and coordinate calendars, schedule interviews, and organize meetings for recruitment consultants and management, ensuring all appointments are accurately tracked and confirmed.Prepare, format, and proofread recruitment documents, including candidate CVs, job descriptions, interview feedback, and client proposals, maintaining confidentiality and attention to detail.Handle email correspondence, respond to inquiries, and manage communication between candidates, clients, and internal team members in a timely and professional manner.Maintain and update applicant tracking systems (ATS) and recruitment databases, ensuring data integrity and compliance with privacy regulations.Conduct initial candidate screening via email or phone, gather required documentation, and coordinate next steps in the recruitment process.Assist with the preparation and distribution of marketing materials, job postings, and social media updates to support candidate sourcing and employer branding initiatives.Generate regular reports on recruitment metrics, candidate pipelines, and client activity using spreadsheets and reporting tools.Support invoicing, billing, and basic bookkeeping tasks related to recruitment placements and client accounts.Coordinate travel arrangements, visa documentation, and logistics for candidates and staff as needed, particularly for international placements.Continuously identify opportunities to improve administrative processes and implement best practices for remote support in a recruitment environment.
Required Experience & Skills
Demonstrated experience as a virtual assistant, administrative assistant, or similar remote support role, preferably within the recruitment, HR, or professional services sector.Advanced proficiency with digital productivity tools such as Microsoft Office Suite (Word, Excel, Outlook, PowerPoint), Google Workspace (Docs, Sheets, Calendar), and cloud-based file management systems (e.g., Dropbox, Google Drive).Familiarity with applicant tracking systems (ATS) such as Bullhorn, Greenhouse, or Workable, and the ability to quickly learn new recruitment software platforms.Excellent written and verbal communication skills in English, with the ability to draft professional correspondence and interact effectively with diverse stakeholders.Strong organizational and time management skills, with proven ability to prioritize tasks, manage multiple deadlines, and maintain accuracy under pressure.High level of discretion and confidentiality when handling sensitive candidate and client information.Experience with basic bookkeeping, invoicing, and financial record-keeping using tools like QuickBooks, Xero, or similar platforms is advantageous.Proactive problem-solving abilities and a customer-service mindset, with a focus on anticipating needs and delivering solutions.Adaptability to work independently in a remote environment, demonstrating self-motivation and accountability.
Qualifications
Bachelor’s degree in Business Administration, Human Resources, Communications, or a related field is preferred but not mandatory.Professional certification in office administration, virtual assistance, or HR support is an asset.Prior experience supporting recruitment or HR functions is highly desirable.Reliable high-speed internet connection and a dedicated workspace suitable for confidential work.
Tools & Technologies
Productivity: Microsoft Office Suite, Google Workspace, Dropbox, Google DriveCommunication: Zoom, Microsoft Teams, Slack, WhatsApp BusinessRecruitment: Applicant Tracking Systems (Bullhorn, Greenhouse, Workable), LinkedIn RecruiterReporting & Analytics: Microsoft Excel, Google SheetsBookkeeping: QuickBooks, Xero (if applicable)Social Media: LinkedIn, Facebook, Twitter (for job postings and employer branding)
This Virtual Assistant role offers the opportunity to make a significant impact on the efficiency and success of a dynamic recruitment firm serving the Dubai market. The position provides exposure to international recruitment operations, the chance to develop advanced administrative skills, and the flexibility of remote work while maintaining a structured schedule. Success in this role will be measured by the ability to deliver timely, accurate, and proactive support that enhances the productivity of the recruitment team and contributes to positive client and candidate experiences.
By applying to this position, you are granting us permission to process your CV and keep your profile on file for consideration for this and future opportunities.

basic_info.title: YouTube Channel Manager Strategist  - Freelance pour un média (H/F)

description.text:
Nous recherchons pour un grand média culturel francophone international, un·e YouTube Channel Manager Strategist  expérimenté·e pour piloter la stratégie, la diffusion, la croissance et la monétisation de plusieurs chaînes YouTube à portée mondiale.
Objectif : Accroître l’audience et le chiffre d’affaires publicitaire généré par les chaînes existantes, en développant une approche éditoriale exigeante, des contenus impactants et des process performants.
Missions principales
Optimisation & gestion de chaînes YouTubeParamétrage des flux automatiques via API et ingestion manuelle.Organisation stratégique de la programmation des publications et des diffusions.Adaptation éditoriale des métadonnées (titres, descriptions, crédits, SEO).Mise en place des géoblocages si nécessaire.
Stratégie éditoriale & animationCréation de vignettes impactantes pour chaque vidéo.Pilotage de la ligne éditoriale multi-chaînes en lien avec les équipes internes.Élaboration d’une stratégie de publication cohérente, engageante et data-driven.
Création de contenus complémentairesProduction de formats courts (Shorts YouTube) à partir des vidéos longues existantes.Remontage éventuel de vidéos (blur, cut) selon les exigences de la plateforme.Adaptation créative des vidéos à fort potentiel pour une meilleure viralité.
Protection de contenu & reportingSurveillance des contenus pirates grâce à YouTube Content-ID.Gestion des réclamations et signalements.Reporting mensuel complet et comité de pilotage trimestriel avec recommandations stratégiques.
Compétences attendues :Min. 3 ans d’expérience en gestion de chaînes YouTube.Maîtrise des outils de création de vignettes et de montage (Premiere, Photoshop…).Bonne connaissance des outils d’analyse et d’optimisation YouTube (VidIQ, TubeBuddy).Capacité à travailler en coordination avec des équipes éditoriales exigeantes.Une expérience dans les médias d'informations est un plus pour la gestion de chaînes à dominante “info”.
Modalités de la mission :Freelance / Mission longue (renouvelable jusqu’à 36 mois)Démarrage : septembre / octobre 2025Lieu : Paris — présentiel partiel (50%)
💌 Intéressé·e par cette mission ?Envoyez votre profil et vos références à : cynthia@btf-consulting.fr

Qui sommes-nous ?
À l’origine agence pionnière dans le marketing éditorial, Bigger Than Fiction accompagne depuis plus de 10 ans les médias dans l’animation de leurs communautés et la conception de dispositifs novateurs et engageants autour des programmes : nous avons accompagné la stratégie réseaux sociaux d’ARTE, Studio+, CanalPlay, CanalSat et France 5; nous avons conçu les dispositifs transmédias des séries SKAM et CUT France ou encore imaginé des activations digitales pour des lancements de programmes phares comme Game Of Thrones. Forts de notre expertise des écosystèmes digitaux et de notre connaissance des enjeux du secteur audiovisuel, c’est de manière naturelle que nous avons proposé aux chaînes nos services de consulting éditorial.
Depuis 2017, BTF Consulting accompagne les grands groupes dans le développement de leurs activités numériques. Pour leur compte, nous collaborons avec les meilleurs talents du secteur numérique et aujourd’hui, BTF Consulting, c’est un réseau de consultant.e.s en mission chez nos clients à des postes de Community Managers, Social Media Managers, Consultant.e.s Social Media, Journalistes Social Media, Éditeur-trice.s de contenus, Producteur.rice.s de contenus, Creative Designer, DA, Motion Designers).
Pourquoi travailler avec nous ? 
Tickets Resto : carte Swile, avec 10€ par jour de travail, dont 50% pris en chargeMutuelle : Alan, prise en charge de 50% des cotisationsTransports : prise en charge de 50% de la carte d’abonnement
Nos Talents participent à nos évènements de Team Building : nous organisons des évènements conviviaux et informels pour les moments marquants l’année, des interventions d’experts et des Sharing Nights qui donnent la parole à nos Talents.
Notre engagement RSE Chez BTF Consulting, la diversité et l’inclusion ne sont pas que des mots.Nous croyons que chacun a sa place pour s’épanouir. 🌈Ouvert à tous: seul votre talent compte. 🌍

description.text:
WHO WE AREWeLearn is a recently created startup, founded by two former Google and Facebook Strategist and Project Manager experiencing extremely rapid growth. At WeLearn we partner with content creators and influencers and we support them in running their businesses.We are an extremely motivated, ambitious and passionate team.We are looking for talented and driven individuals who want to join a vibrant company like no other.
ABOUT THE FOUNDERSDavide Delgrossi, Founder and CEO, ex Google, CEMS and Rotterdam School of Management Alumnus.Diego Beccarelli, Co-Founder and COO, ex Meta (Facebook) and Roland Berger, CEMS and London School of Economics Alumnus.
WHAT YOU WILL DOIdentify new potential educational content creators fitting WeLearn's requirements and traits.Build a pipeline of potential new creators across various industries and geographies.Create a personalized outreach strategy leveraging various tools and instruments (email, phone, and social media - including LinkedIn, Instagram, TikTok, and Facebook).Provide a world-class prospect and customer experience through every interaction and communication.Keep meticulous records of interactions with leads in our database and provide new ideas and suggestions to optimize the funnel’s process.Identify and promptly inform our top leadership about new business niches, opportunities and ideas.Work directly with our Co-Founder and support him in the crucial decision-making process.
REQUIRED SKILLS AND EXPERIENCE+1 years of experience in salesBachelor Degree is required. A Master's Degree is a plus.Full Professional Fluency in EnglishFluency in Italian is a must have Ability to work full-time and on a flexible schedule, you manage independently your own time. The achievement of the goals is what matters.Strong interpersonal skills (oral and written communication).Positive, proactive approach and problem-solving attitude.Our ideal candidate is someone with grit, drive, and a strong willingness to learn. You do not get scared or demoralised by rejections from our potential partners, and you keep your motivation and morale high.
OUR OFFER AND BENEFITSLocation: Anywhere (Full Remote)Working hours: Flexible but full time availability is requiredFixed compensation + Bonus structureContract: Consultant / Freelancer
WHY YOU MIGHT *NOT* BE EXCITED ABOUT USWe're small team, so if you like more established companies, this role isn’t for you. You'll help create our company's culture.We're a startup. Projects and priorities are likely to shift. You see this as an opportunity, not a problem.You should be comfortable with navigating in uncertainty.WeLearn is a pro-startup, pro-tech organisation. If that’s not your thing, this isn’t the place for you.If you got this far down the list, you must be interested. While you may not possess all of the experience and skills we are looking for, passion for the role and a strong motivation go a long way. And…you have a thirst for learning, you are ambitious, and like working with a team who shares those attributes.

WHO WE AREWeLearn is a recently created startup, founded by two former Google and Facebook Strategist and Project Manager experiencing extremely rapid growth. At WeLearn we partner with content creators and influencers and we support them in running their businesses.We are an extremely motivated, ambitious and passionate team.We are looking for talented and driven individuals who want to join a vibrant company like no other.
ABOUT THE FOUNDERSDavide Delgrossi, Founder and CEO, ex Google, CEMS and Rotterdam School of Management Alumnus.Diego Beccarelli, Co-Founder and COO, ex Meta (Facebook) and Roland Berger, CEMS and London School of Economics Alumnus.
WHAT YOU WILL DOIdentify new potential educational content creators fitting WeLearn's requirements and traits.Build a pipeline of potential new creators across various industries and geographies.Create a personalized outreach strategy leveraging various tools and instruments (email, phone, and social media - including LinkedIn, Instagram, TikTok, and Facebook).Provide a world-class prospect and customer experience through every interaction and communication.Keep meticulous records of interactions with leads in our database and provide new ideas and suggestions to optimize the funnel’s process.Identify and promptly inform our top leadership about new business niches, opportunities and ideas.Work directly with our Co-Founder and support him in the crucial decision-making process.
REQUIRED SKILLS AND EXPERIENCE+1 years of experience in salesBachelor Degree is required. A Master's Degree is a plus.Full Professional Fluency in EnglishFluency in Italian is a must have Ability to work full-time and on a flexible schedule, you manage independently your own time. The achievement of the goals is what matters.Strong interpersonal skills (oral and written communication).Positive, proactive approach and problem-solving attitude.Our ideal candidate is someone with grit, drive, and a strong willingness to learn. You do not get scared or demoralised by rejections from our potential partners, and you keep your motivation and morale high.
OUR OFFER AND BENEFITSLocation: Anywhere (Full Remote)Working hours: Flexible but full time availability is requiredFixed compensation + Bonus structureContract: Consultant / Freelancer
WHY YOU MIGHT *NOT* BE EXCITED ABOUT USWe're small team, so if you like more established companies, this role isn’t for you. You'll help create our company's culture.We're a startup. Projects and priorities are likely to shift. You see this as an opportunity, not a problem.You should be comfortable with navigating in uncertainty.WeLearn is a pro-startup, pro-tech organisation. If that’s not your thing, this isn’t the place for you.If you got this far down the list, you must be interested. While you may not possess all of the experience and skills we are looking for, passion for the role and a strong motivation go a long way. And…you have a thirst for learning, you are ambitious, and like working with a team who shares those attributes.

description.text:
Job Responsibilities:Develop and implement comprehensive brand strategies to drive brand awareness, loyalty, and business growth.Plan and manage integrated marketing communications (IMC) campaigns to promote the company’s brands.Oversee the creation and maintenance of brand assets, including website content and promotional materials, ensuring consistency and compliance with brand guidelines.Conduct market research and analysis to uncover consumer insights, track market trends, and assess the competitive landscape, translating findings into actionable branding strategies.Collaborate with marketing, sales, and go-to-market teams to ensure brand consistency across all channels and initiatives.Monitor and evaluate brand performance metrics, adjusting marketing strategies as needed to maximize campaign effectiveness.Develop brand guidelines for internal teams and external agencies, ensuring effective execution of brand strategies.Provide strategic recommendations to senior management on enhancing brand image and market recognition based on research and insights.
Job Requirements:Bachelor’s degree or above in Marketing, Business, or a related field.Excellent communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to influence and collaborate across functions and levels.Solid understanding of brand development strategies and marketing trends.Strong analytical skills with the ability to interpret data, metrics, and consumer behavior insights.Proven experience in conducting market research and turning insights into practical strategies.Demonstrated leadership and project management abilities.Proficiency in relevant software applications (e.g., MS Office, marketing analytics tools, design platforms).

description.text:
Note: This position is required to be based in Dubai. Candidates must either currently reside in Dubai or be willing to relocate.
Who We Are Freedx is a newly established cryptocurrency exchange dedicated to providing a seamless, secure, and innovative trading experience. Our team comprises experienced professionals from the crypto, finance, and technology sectors, all passionate about driving the future of digital finance. At Freedx, we are committed to creating a platform that empowers our clients with the freedom to manage their digital assets confidently and efficiently.
Our Vision: At Freedx, our vision is to be the most trusted and reliable cryptocurrency exchange, offering unparalleled freedom and scalability to our clients. We aim to build a platform where users can trade and manage their assets with complete peace of mind, knowing that their security and reliability are our top priorities. We strive to continuously innovate and adapt to the evolving needs of the crypto market, ensuring that our clients have access to the best tools and services to achieve their financial goals.
Job Summary: Freedx is seeking a dynamic and strategic Head of Marketing/Senior Marketing Manager to lead our overall marketing efforts. This role will be crucial in developing and implementing marketing strategies, managing brand development, and positioning Freedx as a leader in the cryptocurrency exchange market.
Key Responsibilities: Day 1 (Launch Phase):Develop marketing strategy and go-to-market planEstablish brand guidelines and positioning for FreedxSet up key marketing channels and platformsCreate a launch campaign for the exchangeEstablish KPIs and analytics tools for measuring marketing effectivenessContinue growing and optimising the marketing team.
On-going: Develop and execute comprehensive marketing strategies across all channelsManage and grow the marketing team, ensuring efficient execution of marketing activitiesOversee brand development and marketing communicationsAnalyze marketing metrics and adjust strategies accordinglyCollaborate with product team on go-to-market strategies for new features and productsManage marketing budget and optimize resource allocationOversee content creation and distribution across various platformsPlan and execute marketing campaigns to drive user acquisition and retentionStay informed about industry trends and competitor activitiesCollaborate with other departments to ensure marketing efforts align with overall business goalsProvide regular reports on marketing performance and ROI to leadership

Qualifications: Experience: Minimum of 8 years in marketing, with at least 5 years in cryptocurrency, fintech, or related industriesEducation: Bachelor's degree in Marketing, Business, or related field. MBA or relevant marketing certifications are a plus
Skills: Strong strategic thinking and planning abilitiesExcellent leadership and team management skillsDeep understanding of digital marketing channels and techniquesProficiency in marketing analytics and data-driven decision makingStrong communication and presentation skills
Preferred Attributes: Creativity: Innovative approach to marketing in the competitive crypto spaceAdaptability: Ability to thrive in a fast-paced, evolving industryTechnical Aptitude: Understanding of blockchain technology and cryptocurrency marketsGlobal Mindset: Experience with international marketing campaignsResults-Oriented: Strong focus on measurable outcomes and ROI
What We Offer:Competitive salaryGenerous paid leaveOpportunity for professional development, participation to industry events
Freedx is an equal opportunity employer. We stand for an open and inclusive work environment that fosters the well-being of everyone. We embrace and encourage differences in age, color, disability, ethnicity, family or marital status, gender identity or expression, language, national origin, physical and mental ability, race, religion, sexual orientation, socio-economic status, veteran status, and other characteristics that make our people unique.

description.text:
About the Company:CGK Linens is a leading US-based eCommerce company specializing in high-quality bedding products. With a strong commitment to delivering exceptional customer experiences, we manage complex international logistics operations to ensure our products reach customers worldwide efficiently.
About the Role:We are looking to hire an experienced and motivated Amazon PPC Manager to lead our digital advertising initiatives. The ideal candidate will bring a unique blend of a strategic mindset, analytical acumen, and a hands-on approach to Amazon advertising. If you are a results-oriented PPC professional with a passion for driving digital success while thriving in a fun and fast-paced work culture, we invite you to apply for this exciting opportunity to shape the future of our company’s growth.
This role is a Full-Time remote position.
We are looking for an Amazon PPC Manager, specifically with these requirements:Excellent written and verbal communication skills in English.Proven experience of 2-3 years successfully managing Amazon PPC campaigns and paid advertising.Comfortable working in a fast-paced e-commerce environment.Expertise in Amazon Seller Central.Experience with Amazon PPC Bulk Operations.Excellent analytical skills and ability to interpret data.Prior experience managing large budgets (500k min monthly ad spend).Prior experience managing large catalogs (500 SKUs minimum).Strong understanding of KPIs and online marketing.Must be available to work full-time (9 am - 5 pm EST - or similar).Availability to meet the team when needed.
Your responsibility will include (but not be limited to):Manage and optimize Amazon PPC campaigns to achieve business goals.Conduct keyword research and analysis to identify high-impact keywords.Monitor campaign performance and make data-driven decisions to maximize ROI.Deep understanding of all ad types.Stay up-to-date with industry trends and best practices in Amazon advertising.Incredibly organized and self-motivated.
Growth Opportunities/Perks:Paid Holidays (will vary depending on country of residence).Paid Time Off.Location independent/fully remote role.Be part of a team that has a lot of freedom for people to be left to their own devices and perform great work.
This Position Is Perfect For You If…
You're an Analytical and Detailed-Oriented Problem Solver.Possesses robust analytical skills with a meticulous approach to problem-solving. Demonstrates a keen attention to detail, adept at identifying inefficiencies in strategies, and excels in crafting creative solutions based on thorough analysis and observations.
You're an Excellent Communicator.Possesses exceptional verbal, written, and interpersonal skills. Demonstrates the ability to articulate complex topics clearly and concisely, ensuring effective communication and delivering the highest level of service to our clients.
You’re a Team Player.Radiates positivity and friendliness, embodying an optimistic outlook. Enjoys collaboration and excels in communication across various platforms, including regular weekly video calls. Possesses the ability to self-motivate and inspire the team to strive for excellence and achieve outstanding results.
Our hiring process is made up of four parts, so please be aware that you will need to dedicate time to a questionnaire, a video, and two 1-on-1 interviews.Thank you for taking the time to consider this position. I look forward to hearing from you soon!

description.text:
Convention collective/emploi conventionnel

CC DES PERSONNELS DE DROIT PRIVE DES CCI - CONSEILLER(ERE) D'ENTREPRISE II NIVEAU 6

Domaine d'activité

Conseils aux entreprises

Intitulé du poste

Conseiller numérique H/F

Missions

Le conseiller numérique a pour mission d’accompagner les entreprises et de promouvoir les offres de services régionales et locales de la CCIR Paris Ile-de-France à travers des prestations subventionnées et payantes.

 Accompagnement et conseil numérique de premier niveau subventionné :

Identifier et prospecter des TPE-PME pour leur présenter les enjeux de la transformation numérique, les inciter à s’engager dans un parcours digital et leur proposer des solutions adaptées

Réaliser des diagnostics numériques, évaluer la maturité digitale de l’entreprise et définir avec le dirigeant les chantiers de transformation prioritaires

 Développement de l’offre de services numériques payantes :

Contribuer à l’atteinte des objectifs commerciaux et de chiffre d’affaires définis avec son manager

Promouvoir et réaliser les services de la CCI en fonction des besoins identifiés

Concevoir et réaliser des stratégies digitales360° adaptées aux besoins spécifiques de chaque entreprise en fournissant des plans d’action concrets

Développer le portefeuille clients/ réseau de contacts,

Identifier des opportunités de mise en relation et d’apport d’affaires auprès d’une cible de PME donnant lieu à des revenus additionnels

 Conduite d’actions collectives et sensibilisation :

Concevoir et animer des actions de sensibilisation et de sourcing prospects (webinars, événements) afin de vulgariser les enjeux de la transition numérique (prospection digitale, utilisation des réseaux sociaux, IA, cybersécurité)

Participer à l’organisation d’événements

 Gestion et reporting :

Contribuer à la connaissance des besoins des entreprises en renseignant le CRM

Assurer un reporting et un suivi de l’avancée des objectifs fixés avec les outils mis en place au niveau régional

Respecter les process, la fourniture des livrables, justificatifs et les délais exigés par les dossiers relevant de financement type FSE/FEDER.

Profil recherché

De formation supérieure (Diplôme Bac+3 à 5) dans le domaine du numérique, du commerce ou de la gestion d’entreprise, vous justifiez d'une expérience de 2 à 5 ans dans l'accompagnement des TPE-PME,

Vous avez des connaissances approfondies des leviers numériques (SEO, SEA, réseaux sociaux, web analyse) et des outils de transition digitale.

Une expertise sectorielle serait un plus : compétences spécifiques en IA ou cybersécurité ou autres technologies d’usage numérique dans les TPE-PME (CRM, ERP, ...).

Vous avez une appétence pour le développement d’une activité commerciale, vous êtes à l'aise pour détecter des besoins, argumenter et conclure la vente de prestations payantes.

Vous êtes autonome, rigoureux, organisé et faites preuve d’initiative. Vous avez un esprit d’analyse et de synthèse et rédigez avec clarté. Le sens du travail en équipe, des qualités d’écoute et un bon relationnel sont des qualités indispensables pour ce poste.

Le Groupe Chambre de Commerce et d’Industrie Paris Ile-de-France œuvre pour une politique active d'accueil des personnes en situation de handicap. Les candidatures sont étudiées selon ce principe.

 Date limite de candidature : 02/12/2024

Type de contrat

CDI

Forfait jour

Oui

Temps de travail

Temps plein

Date de prise de fonction souhaitée

01/01/2025

Informations supplémentaires

Catégorie socio professionnelle

Cadre

Déplacement

Oui

Télétravail

Oui

Fourchette de salaire brut annuel minimum et maximum (K€)

Entre 38 K€ et 42 K€ bruts pour un niveau d'expérience sur poste similaire entre 2 et 5 ans

Avantages

Tickets restaurant,

Compte épargne temps,

Epargne salariale attractive,

Prévoyance et retraite supplémentaire,

Activités sociales et culturelles du CSE

Localisation du poste

Localisation du poste

France, Ile-de-France, Val de Marne (94)

Lieu de travail

8 place Salvador Allende 94000 Créteil

Critères candidat

Niveau d'études

Licence

Expérience requise

Minimum 2 ans

description.text:
Caudalie, c'est une histoire unique, une histoire de rencontres, de vigne, de passion et d'expertise beauté. Nous sommes aujourd'hui plus de 1000 collaborateurs dans le monde.Pour accompagner notre fort développement en France et à l'international, nous avons besoin de vos talents !
Caudalie recherche un ou une CRM & Lifecycle Marketing Manager pour rejoindre notre équipe E-commerce.Au sein de l’équipe E-commerce, vous serez responsable de la stratégie CRM globale sur la zone EMEA, avec pour mission de piloter l’engagement client à travers des leviers omnicanaux et des parcours personnalisés.
Animation CRM omnicanaleConcevoir et piloter le plan d’animation CRM EMEA (emailing, SMS, wallet, testing produit) en lien avec le calendrier commercial et éditorial.Définir les stratégies d’engagement et de conversion pour maximiser la valeur client : offres, contenus, segmentation et scénarios.Garantir la cohérence du discours, de l’image de marque et de l’excellence des communications.Marketing automation & fidélisationDéfinir et optimiser les parcours automatisés omnicanaux servant les différents objectifs (engagement, avis produits, drive-to-store, conversion on site)Piloter le marketing du programme de fidélité : animation, évolution des mécaniques et amplification de sa visibilité.Identifier et déployer des initiatives pour enrichir la relation client (parrainage, évènements, etc.).Base de données clientsGarantir la croissance, la qualité et la pertinence de la base CRM, via des actions ciblées de collecte et d’enrichissement.Affiner la segmentation pour activer des communications personnalisées et maximiser la valeur client.Projets customer experience & service consommateurAmélioration des parcours clients et interactions en capitalisant sur les feedbacks Service Consommateur et outils relationnels.Pilotage & analyseSuivre et analyser la performance des campagnes et parcours.Définir un plan d’A/B testing annuel pour challenger les performances et valider les optimisations.Élaborer des bilans et recommandations pour optimiser les actions et nourrir la stratégie CRM.Collaboration transverse avec les équipes :CRM Tech Globale pour la mise en place technique des parcours et campagnes.E-commerce & Digital pour coordonner les lancements et contenus site.Acquisition lors des campagnes de collecte de lead.Brand content et le Studio pour garantir la cohérence créative. 
Profil recherchéExpérience solide (6 à 8 ans) dans le CRM marketing, idéalement dans l’univers beauté/luxe.Excellente maîtrise des outils CRM, fidélisation, automation.Vision stratégique et capacité à mesurer l’impact business des actions menées.Soft skillsSensibilité à l’univers premium, souci du détail.Esprit analytique, data-driven, orienté performance.Leadership collaboratif et capacité à fédérer les équipes autour de projets communs.Informations complémentairesLocalisation : Paris 4ᵉ – au cœur du Marais.Contrat : CDI – à pourvoir dès que possible.
Pourquoi rejoindre Caudalie ?Rejoignez une entreprise à taille humaine, en pleine croissance et engagée ! Au sein d’un environnement de travail stimulant et d’une culture entrepreneuriale, vous bénéficierez d’opportunités d’évolution rapide, tout en contribuant à des projets stratégiques d’envergure.
Basé(e) dans nos futurs bureaux parisiens, idéalement situés au cœur du Marais, vous profiterez d’avantages attractifs :Des cours de sport les midis.Des tarifs préférentiels sur les produits et le Spa ainsi que des produits offerts tout au long de l’année.ALAN comme mutuelle familiale avec une prise en charge généreuse par Caudalie.Un Plan d'Epargne Entreprise qui vous permet de devenir actionnaire.12€ par jour travaillé de titres restaurants sur SWILE (prise en charge à 57% par Caudalie).
Avec un rôle stratégique dans le pilotage de la relation client, vous contribuerez à l’élaboration de stratégies CRM omnicanales innovantes, conçues pour renforcer l’engagement, la fidélisation et la valeur client sur l’ensemble des marchés européens. Intégrez une équipe passionnée et tournée vers l’excellence digitale, où votre expertise CRM sera essentielle pour personnaliser nos communications, sublimer l’expérience client et soutenir la croissance de Caudalie.com et de nos autres canaux.Prêt(e) à devenir un partenaire de confiance au sein de Caudalie ? Envoyez-nous votre candidature !
L'inclusion des différences est une force chez Caudalie, nous sommes convaincus que diversité rime avec performance, nous portons donc la même attention à toutes les candidatures.

jobs.description:
Caudalie, c'est une histoire unique, une histoire de rencontres, de vigne, de passion et d'expertise beauté. Nous sommes aujourd'hui plus de 1000 collaborateurs dans le monde.Pour accompagner notre fort développement en France et à l'international, nous avons besoin de vos talents !
Caudalie recherche un ou une CRM & Lifecycle Marketing Manager pour rejoindre notre équipe E-commerce.Au sein de l’équipe E-commerce, vous serez responsable de la stratégie CRM globale sur la zone EMEA, avec pour mission de piloter l’engagement client à travers des leviers omnicanaux et des parcours personnalisés.
Animation CRM omnicanaleConcevoir et piloter le plan d’animation CRM EMEA (emailing, SMS, wallet, testing produit) en lien avec le calendrier commercial et éditorial.Définir les stratégies d’engagement et de conversion pour maximiser la valeur client : offres, contenus, segmentation et scénarios.Garantir la cohérence du discours, de l’image de marque et de l’excellence des communications.Marketing automation & fidélisationDéfinir et optimiser les parcours automatisés omnicanaux servant les différents objectifs (engagement, avis produits, drive-to-store, conversion on site)Piloter le marketing du programme de fidélité : animation, évolution des mécaniques et amplification de sa visibilité.Identifier et déployer des initiatives pour enrichir la relation client (parrainage, évènements, etc.).Base de données clientsGarantir la croissance, la qualité et la pertinence de la base CRM, via des actions ciblées de collecte et d’enrichissement.Affiner la segmentation pour activer des communications personnalisées et maximiser la valeur client.Projets customer experience & service consommateurAmélioration des parcours clients et interactions en capitalisant sur les feedbacks Service Consommateur et outils relationnels.Pilotage & analyseSuivre et analyser la performance des campagnes et parcours.Définir un plan d’A/B testing annuel pour challenger les performances et valider les optimisations.Élaborer des bilans et recommandations pour optimiser les actions et nourrir la stratégie CRM.Collaboration transverse avec les équipes :CRM Tech Globale pour la mise en place technique des parcours et campagnes.E-commerce & Digital pour coordonner les lancements et contenus site.Acquisition lors des campagnes de collecte de lead.Brand content et le Studio pour garantir la cohérence créative. 
Profil recherchéExpérience solide (6 à 8 ans) dans le CRM marketing, idéalement dans l’univers beauté/luxe.Excellente maîtrise des outils CRM, fidélisation, automation.Vision stratégique et capacité à mesurer l’impact business des actions menées.Soft skillsSensibilité à l’univers premium, souci du détail.Esprit analytique, data-driven, orienté performance.Leadership collaboratif et capacité à fédérer les équipes autour de projets communs.Informations complémentairesLocalisation : Paris 4ᵉ – au cœur du Marais.Contrat : CDI – à pourvoir dès que possible.
Pourquoi rejoindre Caudalie ?Rejoignez une entreprise à taille humaine, en pleine croissance et engagée ! Au sein d’un environnement de travail stimulant et d’une culture entrepreneuriale, vous bénéficierez d’opportunités d’évolution rapide, tout en contribuant à des projets stratégiques d’envergure.
Basé(e) dans nos futurs bureaux parisiens, idéalement situés au cœur du Marais, vous profiterez d’avantages attractifs :Des cours de sport les midis.Des tarifs préférentiels sur les produits et le Spa ainsi que des produits offerts tout au long de l’année.ALAN comme mutuelle familiale avec une prise en charge généreuse par Caudalie.Un Plan d'Epargne Entreprise qui vous permet de devenir actionnaire.12€ par jour travaillé de titres restaurants sur SWILE (prise en charge à 57% par Caudalie).
Avec un rôle stratégique dans le pilotage de la relation client, vous contribuerez à l’élaboration de stratégies CRM omnicanales innovantes, conçues pour renforcer l’engagement, la fidélisation et la valeur client sur l’ensemble des marchés européens. Intégrez une équipe passionnée et tournée vers l’excellence digitale, où votre expertise CRM sera essentielle pour personnaliser nos communications, sublimer l’expérience client et soutenir la croissance de Caudalie.com et de nos autres canaux.Prêt(e) à devenir un partenaire de confiance au sein de Caudalie ? Envoyez-nous votre candidature !
L'inclusion des différences est une force chez Caudalie, nous sommes convaincus que diversité rime avec performance, nous portons donc la même attention à toutes les candidatures.

description.text:
At Accelerant, we’re transforming the way capacity is distributed to specialist MGAs across Europe, UK, US and Canada. We help our partner MGA’s growth through high-quality capacity, strategic advice, streamlined processes, and exceptional service. We value innovation, collaboration, and a data-driven approach to create lasting success for our partners.
The RoleTo be successful in this role you will need significant experience of insurance and MGA operations/binder management. You also need to be a comfortable leader.
We are seeking a French-speaking Insurance Professional to join our growing team of experts. The Member Relationship Director lead MGA onboarding, relationship management, and operational delivery for our MGA Members across Europe. This is a high-impact role where you will be the key link between our Members, Brokers, Underwriters, and internal teams — ensuring exceptional service and strategic growth opportunities.
What You'll DoLead onboarding for new MGA Members, from due diligence to operational go-live.Manage relationships with existing MGA Members, ensuring ongoing satisfaction and growth.Identify strategic and tactical opportunities to support MGA Member success.Oversee and improve operational processes for greater efficiency.Ensure compliance with local and European regulatory standards.Act as an escalation point for operational issues, audits, and credit control matters.Coordinate with TPAs, Brokers, and Underwriters for smooth and timely information flow.
What You BringStrong knowledge and understanding of MGA operations and binder management.Experience in insuranceFluency in French and English (additional European languages are a plus).Proven experience managing MGA or delegated authority business relationships.Strong understanding of European insurance market regulations.Excellent communication and stakeholder management skills.Self-starter mindset with the ability to work in a geographically diverse team.
Why Join UsBe part of a fast-growing, innovative company redefining delegated underwriting.Work alongside industry experts in an international, collaborative environment.Opportunity to shape and improve processes with measurable impact.Competitive compensation.
Enjoy our comprehensive benefits package designed to meet your diverse needs and support your well-being:
Work-life balance: We believe that taking time to rest and recharge makes us all better. That’s why we offer flexible time off and encourage our team to take the time they need to prioritize their health and well-being.
Health and wellness: We offer high-quality health, dental, and other benefits to ensureour team members have access to the care they need.
Remote work: Work where you’re most productive and fulfilled. This position is open to remote candidates across Europe who have the flexibility to work with our teams distributed across Europe and North America. Most cross-team collaboration happens in the mornings of the Eastern Time Zone.
Travel: We value face-to-face connections and believe that in-person interactions can enhance collaboration and build stronger relationships. Travel could be a small part of your role, with opportunities to connect with your team and our members in person.

About Accelerant:Accelerant is a data-driven risk exchange connecting underwriters of specialty insurance risk with risk capital providers. Accelerant was founded in 2018 by a group of longtime insurance industry executives and technology experts who shared a vision of rebuilding the way risk is exchanged – so that it works better, for everyone. The Accelerant risk exchange does business across more than 20 different countries and 250 specialty products, and we are proud that our insurers have been awarded an AM Best A- (Excellent) rating. For more information, please visit www.accelerant.ai
Ready to join us? Apply now and help us deliver exceptional service to our MGA Members across Europe.

description.text:
Position Title: Manager of Business Development RepresentativesLocation: EMEAEmployment Type: Full-TimeOnsite, Remote/Flexible, or Hybrid: Remote/FlexibleDepartment: MarketingHiring Manager: VP Demand Generation & Revenue MarketingTravel: Minimal (Up to 5%)
COMPANY SUMMARY:
Here at Aprimo, our mission is to empower the marketing organizations of today to build the brands of tomorrow. Aprimo is a pioneer of the marketing resource and digital asset management space, and we deliver an innovative, industry-leading SaaS solution that changes the way companies like Affinity Petcare, Nomad Foods, Laborie, and Pret A Manger work, create, collaborate, and learn in order to deliver exceptional brand experiences at scale.
Aprimo helps enterprises unleash the power of their content by providing a marketing automation software and digital asset management software that manages the behind-the-scenes activities involved in marketing. Our product allows companies to manage content planning, creation and distribution all in one place, store content and media in a shared repository, and receive in-depth insights into how content performs.
Founded in 1998, Aprimo has five offices internationally, including Chicago headquarters, and offers a flexible work-from-home/remote-work policy.
Named a Leader in Digital Asset Management (DAM) and Marketing Resource Management by Gartner and Forrester in 2025 and winner of the 2021 Tech Cares Award for our work with Aprimo HELPS, we build on the power of our people to make an impact both in our industry and in our communities.

POSITION SUMMARY:
We are seeking a Manager of EMEA Business Development Representatives (BDR) to join our team and drive the success of our outbound BDR efforts. This is a first-line management role, not a manager-of-managers position, making it perfect for a hands-on leader eager to roll up their sleeves and make an impact.

WHAT YOU WILL BE RESPONSIBLE FOR:
Manage & Lead BDR Team: Oversee and motivate a high-performing outbound BDR team, setting clear goals and benchmarks for success.Player-Coach Leadership: Lead by example by demonstrating best practices in prospecting, cold calling, and account engagement.Develop & Execute BDR Playbooks: Create, refine, and implement playbooks and strategies that drive consistent results and pipeline growth.Coach & Mentor: Provide individualized coaching and mentorship to help BDRs improve their skills in communication, prospecting, and closing qualified opportunities.Hands-On Engagement: Actively participate in team activities, from shadowing calls to refining messaging, ensuring alignment with overall sales and marketing strategies.Analytics & Performance: Leverage tools like Salesforce, Salesloft, Chorus, Cognism, Zoominfo, and other martech solutions to track performance metrics, analyze results, and identify areas for improvement.Collaboration: Partner closely with sales and marketing leadership to align goals, share insights, and optimize the lead-to-opportunity process.Additional responsibilities and duties as required

CANDIDATE QUALIFICATIONS & WHY YOU’RE A GREAT FIT FOR THE ROLE:
Proven Leadership: A minimum of 3 years of experience directly leading a BDR team, with demonstrated success in managing a high-performing outbound teamSaaS experience: Prior experience in a SaaS environment is required, ideally within a B2B MarTech or Digital Asset Management companyExpertise in Tools & Processes: Advanced knowledge of Salesforce, Zoominfo, LInkedIn Sales Nav, Salesloft, Cognism, Chorus (or similar tools), and BDR workflows are required.Sales Skills: Exceptional phone, communication, and sales abilities to drive prospecting success are required.Player-Coach Mentality: Ability to model success, working alongside the team to inspire performance is required.BDR Playbook Development: Experience designing and refining effective playbooks and prospecting strategies is required.Data-Driven Approach: Skilled in analyzing metrics, identifying trends, and implementing improvements based on data.Coaching & Mentoring: Proven ability to develop team members’ skills and foster a collaborative, high-energy environment. Ability to do call-coaching is critical to this role.Fluency in English, both written and spoken.

APRIMO CULTURE & WHY YOU’LL LOVE WORKING HERE:
Aprimo offers a forward-thinking, progressive and employee-first culture that is based in both collaboration and flexibility with team members who are friendly, intelligent and enthusiastic people that are committed to the product and mission here at Aprimo.With 5 offices worldwide and teams spread throughout the US, EMEA and Philippines, our multicultural teams work cross-departmentally and across continents and cultures towards a shared goal.We offer a diverse environment that promotes DEI efforts, values multiple perspectives and fresh thinking and which includes Aprimo HELPS, an employee resource group (ERG) that is dedicated to giving back to our local communitiesThrough its relaxed environment, Aprimo embodies a more casual “Silicon Valley” atmosphere.We have a casual dress code that allows employees to express themselves as individuals and which fosters a creative and free-thinking approach to problem solving and business solutions. And it also allows us to wear hoodies and shorts during internal meetings.Flexible work schedules and all positions allowing for either entirely remote or hybrid working arrangements create a deeply rewarding work-life balance.With flexible work schedules, employees can attend to personal matters, such as stepping away to pick up their children from school or to get a much-needed haircut.In a recent internal survey, 89% of staff cited work-life balance as being one of the most rewarding aspects of working at Aprimo!Part of the key to our success is that team members are not only successful at collaboration and open communication, but that they are also given a great deal of autonomy and freedom in their own individual roles.Our culture is not a micro-managing environment – rather, employees are encouraged to be self-starters, to voice new ideas, and to exercise ownership in their individual roles.As such, individual team members can leave a lasting impact and footprint within the organization – in fact, our average employee tenure is 7.7 years.Aprimo employs a “choose your own adventure” approach to career advancement.Staff members are not siloed into roles and for many of our teams there is no set ladder that one needs to climb to achieve growth and promotion.Rather, we emphasize an organic approach to career development in which employees can and do frequently transition into newly created roles within their own teams or transition into other departments based on their interests in exploring new skills and responsibilities.For additional learning and development, we recently rolled out Udemy, which is an online learning platform that employees have access to and which features over 200,000 courses on a wide variety of business topics.Ranked #1 in AI Metadata & Search by Forrester, Aprimo sits on the cutting-edge of technology and is paving new paths forward by incorporating AI (artificial intelligence) into our product offerings.We offer generative AI in a secure environment built for brand safety and governance. Our AI-powered content operations platform, with industry leading digital asset management (DAM) software at its core, helps to optimize the creative process and improve the user experience with better search, recommendations, categorization and summarization.Our AI empowers marketing teams to automate tasks, analyze data, and personalize content, ensuring scalability without sacrificing productivity.AI automatically identifies asset characteristics and transforms them into words a human would search for. Translation, image alterations, personalization, and more are all streamlined by AI.With our platform, marketers can efficiently produce a larger volume of content, engage customers on a personalized level, curate relevant materials, and make data-driven decisions to drive their content strategies forward.Our AI offers up to 72% increase in discoverability and productivity, up to 61% reduction in production time, and up to 66% faster time to market.

APRIMO BENEFITS WE OFFER:
Target Compensation: On-Target Earning ranging from GBP or Euro equivalent of $130,000 - $175,000 USD depending on job related knowledge, skills, and level of experience. This is a general guideline only and not a guarantee of compensation or salary. Additional factors considered in extending an offer include (but are not limited to) responsibilities of the job, education, experience, knowledge, skills and abilities, as well as internal equity, alignment with market data, or other law.Competitive benefits coverage that begins on the first day of employment

basic_info.title: CDD - Digital Executive (Display, VOL, Prog) - H/F

description.text:
Dans le cadre d'un remplacement de congés maternité nous recherchons un Digital Executive en CDD à partir du mois d'octobre.Sous la responsabilité du Digital Expert Lead, vous aurez pour mission d’accompagner plusieurs clients clés de lagence IPG Mediabrands dans leurs recommandations et plans médias digitaux.
RESPONSABILITES CLES
Recommandation et achat de campagnes digitales :● Elaboration de recommandations branding et performance (achats gré à gré et programmatiques) alignées avec la stratégie digitale et répondant aux objectifs media et business de l’annonceur.● Sélection des supports, emplacements et modes d’achats en cohérence avec les objectifs médias de la campagne et la cible business définie par l’équipe planning stratégique● Réalisation et présentation des plans médias : négociation de l’achat d’espace avec les partenaires medias afin de respecter les objectifs de qualité et de productivité● Garant des retours (recommandations, plans médias et bilans) de chacune des expertises (programmatique, adops) sur le fond et la forme
Coordination et optimisation des campagnes :● Réalisation des plans de spécificités techniques● Consolidation et vérification des éléments nécessaires à la mise en ligne● Respect des taxonomies clients et création des trafficking sheet● Travaille en étroite collaboration avec la team data&tech pour s assurer du bon suivi et de la mesure des performances des dispositifs digitaux et du respect des process● Mise à jour de l’outil interne de suivi des campagnes digitales (JIRA)● Force de proposition sur les optimisations en cours de campagnes, basée sur les résultats des reporting intermédiaires (Datorama)
Expertise & analyse :● Pilotage des activations digitales en contact direct avec le client et l’équipe Conseil● Réalisation et présentation de bilans de fin de campagne avec une analyse des performances et des learnings● Accompagnement et participation à la montée en compétence de l’équipe Conseil sur les sujets digitaux et à l’animation des réunions digitales et plénières
Suivi financier :● Création des devis achat en gré à gré● Le suivi de la facturation et des litiges
COMPETENCES ET EXPERIENCES SOUHAITEES
De formation supérieure (M2) et doté(e) d’un bon sens relationnel, vous disposez d’une expérience d'au moins 1 an en agence médias (alternance/stage compris) sur le même poste.Vous êtes à l’aise avec les outils et les plateformes digitales (achat, tracking). Doté(e) d’une forte expertise et curiosité sur l’écosystème digital et les nouveautés technologiques. Vous êtes bon communiquant, pédagogue et doté(e) d’un esprit d’équipe, vous savez vous approprier n’importe quel sujet et le mener à bien.
Compétence informatique :Agile sur Excel (TCD)A l’aise sur Powerpoint (présentations et recommandations)
Langues : Anglais : B2 (minimum et indispensable)
AVANTAGES :Mutuelle et Prévoyance9 RTT par an25 congés payés par an1 jour de repos supplémentaire pour la PentecôtePoste éligible au télétravail (50%)Indemnités télétravailPrise en charge de 50% de l’abonnement aux frais de transports publicsCSE avec offres de dotations (tickets cinéma, chèques cadeaux Noël, remboursement de 100 euros à une activité sportive ou culturelle…)ParticipationRestauration d’entrepriseTravailler dans une agence labélisée Great Place To Work et Best Workplaces for WomenSociété DEI (égalité femmes/hommes, diversité, handicap, journée de sensibilisation à la Diversité)
INTERVIEW PROCESS :🚀 Entretien RH avec notre Talent Acquisition Manager✨Entretien avec le manager du compte🔔 Réponse sous 15 jours
Rejoignez une agence labellisé Great Place To Work !Plus d'informations : https://www.welcometothejungle.com/fr/companies/ipg-mediabrands

Dans le cadre d'un remplacement de congés maternité nous recherchons un Digital Executive en CDD à partir du mois d'octobre.Sous la responsabilité du Digital Expert Lead, vous aurez pour mission d’accompagner plusieurs clients clés de lagence IPG Mediabrands dans leurs recommandations et plans médias digitaux.
RESPONSABILITES CLES
Recommandation et achat de campagnes digitales :● Elaboration de recommandations branding et performance (achats gré à gré et programmatiques) alignées avec la stratégie digitale et répondant aux objectifs media et business de l’annonceur.● Sélection des supports, emplacements et modes d’achats en cohérence avec les objectifs médias de la campagne et la cible business définie par l’équipe planning stratégique● Réalisation et présentation des plans médias : négociation de l’achat d’espace avec les partenaires medias afin de respecter les objectifs de qualité et de productivité● Garant des retours (recommandations, plans médias et bilans) de chacune des expertises (programmatique, adops) sur le fond et la forme
Coordination et optimisation des campagnes :● Réalisation des plans de spécificités techniques● Consolidation et vérification des éléments nécessaires à la mise en ligne● Respect des taxonomies clients et création des trafficking sheet● Travaille en étroite collaboration avec la team data&tech pour s assurer du bon suivi et de la mesure des performances des dispositifs digitaux et du respect des process● Mise à jour de l’outil interne de suivi des campagnes digitales (JIRA)● Force de proposition sur les optimisations en cours de campagnes, basée sur les résultats des reporting intermédiaires (Datorama)
Expertise & analyse :● Pilotage des activations digitales en contact direct avec le client et l’équipe Conseil● Réalisation et présentation de bilans de fin de campagne avec une analyse des performances et des learnings● Accompagnement et participation à la montée en compétence de l’équipe Conseil sur les sujets digitaux et à l’animation des réunions digitales et plénières
Suivi financier :● Création des devis achat en gré à gré● Le suivi de la facturation et des litiges
COMPETENCES ET EXPERIENCES SOUHAITEES
De formation supérieure (M2) et doté(e) d’un bon sens relationnel, vous disposez d’une expérience d'au moins 1 an en agence médias (alternance/stage compris) sur le même poste.Vous êtes à l’aise avec les outils et les plateformes digitales (achat, tracking). Doté(e) d’une forte expertise et curiosité sur l’écosystème digital et les nouveautés technologiques. Vous êtes bon communiquant, pédagogue et doté(e) d’un esprit d’équipe, vous savez vous approprier n’importe quel sujet et le mener à bien.
Compétence informatique :Agile sur Excel (TCD)A l’aise sur Powerpoint (présentations et recommandations)
Langues : Anglais : B2 (minimum et indispensable)
AVANTAGES :Mutuelle et Prévoyance9 RTT par an25 congés payés par an1 jour de repos supplémentaire pour la PentecôtePoste éligible au télétravail (50%)Indemnités télétravailPrise en charge de 50% de l’abonnement aux frais de transports publicsCSE avec offres de dotations (tickets cinéma, chèques cadeaux Noël, remboursement de 100 euros à une activité sportive ou culturelle…)ParticipationRestauration d’entrepriseTravailler dans une agence labélisée Great Place To Work et Best Workplaces for WomenSociété DEI (égalité femmes/hommes, diversité, handicap, journée de sensibilisation à la Diversité)
INTERVIEW PROCESS :🚀 Entretien RH avec notre Talent Acquisition Manager✨Entretien avec le manager du compte🔔 Réponse sous 15 jours
Rejoignez une agence labellisé Great Place To Work !Plus d'informations : https://www.welcometothejungle.com/fr/companies/ipg-mediabrands

description.text:
Technical Export Manager Location: France or elsewhere in the EU (Remote) Travel: Up to 50% International Compensation: Strong base + high-impact performance bonus
Own technical leadership for a European export role with global reach.Step into a high-impact position where your agronomic and product management expertise fuels the global growth of a respected European leader in plant nutrition. You’ll lead technical strategy, guide product performance, and ensure international markets are equipped with the insights and training they need to succeed.
What’s on offerPerformance-driven rewards – strong base plus bonus tied directly to export successEuropean-led, global impact – support a global customer base for a high-growth innovatorProduct leadership – shape product positioning and lifecycle in export marketsCross-functional collaboration – work with regulatory, R&D, and commercial teamsClear progression – develop within a business that grows and retains its technical talent
What you’ll be doingLead technical training and presentations that support commercial adoption in export marketsDesign and manage field trials to validate product performance across regionsProvide expert technical support to sales, customers, and technical centresInfluence product strategy and development based on export market insightsTurn agronomic data into actionable recommendations and technical positioning
What you’ll bring5+ years’ experience in biologicals or plant nutrition, including product management in agronomyAgronomic engineering degree (or equivalent), with strong scientific and commercial instinctsFluent in French and English; Spanish is a strong advantage but not essentialEffective communicator across technical and commercial audiencesReady for international travel (up to 50%)
Who this suits You’re an agronomy specialist with hands-on product management experience. You want to step into a strategic export-facing role where your technical input drives real-world success. You’re commercially minded, globally oriented, and eager to see your expertise shape international growth.
Apply now for a confidential conversation with Walker Lovell.

description.text:
✨ About Us ✨

Photoroom was launched in 2020 after being accepted into Y Combinator and has become the world's most popular AI photo editor over the past four years. Our mission is clear: to create the best visuals for your commerce.

Photoroom puts the power of great images into more people's hands through our powerful and innovative features, from our best-in-the-world background remover to our generative AI model and tools: AI Images, AI Backgrounds and Shadows, AI Expand, and many more.

Processing over 5 billion images a year and downloaded over 200 million times, Photoroom is now the world's #1 AI photo-editing app, available across mobile, web, and via an API in over 180 countries.

Photoroom is a profitable, remote-friendly company headquartered in Paris with a global team of over 100 world-class deep learning, product, and marketing experts with backgrounds at the world's best companies. We are a diverse team of entrepreneurs building for entrepreneurs.

TL;DR

🤓 We are looking for an expert and leader in the People and Talent field, to help us go to the next level. As our new VP of People, you will be helping us scale our team, our processes, and evolve our unique culture.

💰 €150,000 - €185,000* + Stock-Options/BSPCE

🇪🇺 We are flexible: you can work from anywhere in Europe within a 3-hour flight from Paris (HQ) and come to our office once a month (fully reimbursed) or more often. This ensures effective collaboration and supports our commitment to reducing our carbon footprint. However, in leadership positions, we expect you to visit the Paris office more frequently.

✈️ We offer substantial support for relocation (up to 10k€), including finding an apartment in Paris and supporting you with the visa procedure.

🛂 We currently sponsor visas for individuals relocating to France or already based here. We are unable to sponsor visas for remote positions outside of France at this time.

💻 Technology - Laptop, Monitor, Keyboard, etc.

🏖️ Socials - Company Retreat, Weekly Socials & Game Time

🇬🇧 Photoroom is an international team and we work in English. We offer language lessons for those who need them (English & French).

We can go higher for outstanding profiles and adapt to the cost of living if it is higher than in Paris. 

✨ About the role✨

At Photoroom, with a globally loved product, a Series B backing, the foundations are strong - but the real opportunity is ahead, and the next 18 months are pivotal. As we scale towards 200+ people, the opportunity is to mature our People practices while preserving what makes Photoroom special: high standards, deep care for people, and product obsession

Deliver the systems and environment that help every Photoroomer do their best work. You will design and execute lightweight processes and frameworks that will keep the team engaged and performant. You’ll own and evolve our People function — leading a team of 6 across People Ops, Talent, and Office & Events. Scale hiring velocity (incl. first U.S. pod), working closely with the hiring lead while maintaining a bar high and strong revenue impact by employeeYou’ll act as a trusted advisor to our leaders and managers, helping them grow high-performing teams and navigate the messiness of scaling with clarity and care. Drive culture, onboarding, and L&D initiatives so 90 %+ of employees can articulate and live our values. Implement people analytics, payroll, and compliance processes that give leadership insights and make sure the company is not at risk. 

✨ About You ✨

Senior People leadership in a high-growth, international tech company (from 100 people to 250 people). End-to-end ownership of People, Talent, and Operations functions. Proven delivery of compensation, equity, and performance frameworks. Experience scaling distributed teams and opening new hubs. Analytical and data-driven mindset. You use data to spot patterns, drive strategy, and influence decisions. Ability to partner with C-level and influence at all levels. Strong written and spoken English. You’re both business driven and people focused, constantly articulating both and deeply people-focused—designing strategies that drive business performance while creating environments where individuals thrive and feel genuinely supported. French employment law experience

Nice to have:

Experience building L&D or career development programs from scratch. You have experience working with our people tech stack: Hibob, Deel, Lattice. 

If you think you have what it takes but don't meet every single point above, please still apply. We'd love to chat and see if you could be a great fit.

✨ Hiring Process ✨

Screening call with the Talent ManagerIntroduction call with CEOTechnical interview with the CEOCollaborative Session with Cross-functional Leaders & Meet the TeamValues InterviewReference check & Offer

Support - If you have a medical condition or an individual need for an adjustment to our process, and you believe this may affect your ability to be at your best - please let us know so we can talk about how we can best support you and make any adjustments that may be needed.

🌈 Diversity, Equity, Inclusion and Belonging

We are committed to enabling everyone to feel included and valued at the workplace. We believe both the company and its culture are strongest when composed of diverse experiences and backgrounds.

That's why:

 We have flexible working hours We trust people to work remotely We extended the length of the parental leave

All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to age, color, family, gender identity, marital status, national origin, physical or mental disability, sex (including pregnancy), sexual orientation, or any other characteristic protected by applicable laws.

description.text:
Tu contribueras activement à la gestion opérationnelle et créative de nos contenus web, à l’optimisation de nos sites, et à la coordination des campagnes digitales.

Création & Gestion de Contenus Web

Création, mise à jour et déclinaison de landing pages (LP) avec WordPress + Elementor. Intégration de contenus : textes, visuels, vidéos, formulaires, etc. Mise en place de pop-ups, bannières et éléments promotionnels. Création de pages simples (offres, actualités…) selon des templates établis. Garantie de la cohérence éditoriale et graphique entre les marques du groupe. 

Optimisation & Maintenance Web

Vérification du responsive design (mobile & desktop). Contrôle qualité des pages : liens, boutons, images, performance. Suivi de la performance des LP (temps de chargement, taux de rebond…) via GA4. Interface avec notre développeur web interne (Matthieu) pour les bugs ou évolutions UX. 

Gestion de Projet Web & Coordination

Suivi du planning de création des contenus liés aux campagnes marketing. Coordination avec les équipes créa/brand/content pour la livraison des assets. Organisation et mise à jour de notre bibliothèque de templates web (LP, popups…). 

Support aux Contenus Digitaux

Aide à la déclinaison de formats : adapter un article en version LP, infographie, newsletter, social media… Propositions créatives pour améliorer l’impact visuel ou narratif des pages. Étudiant·e en communication digitale, marketing web, design ou multimédia (bac +3 à +5). À l’aise avec WordPress et des outils comme Elementor, Canva, Notion. Esprit rigoureux, œil pour le détail, sens du design et du storytelling digital. Bonne compréhension des logiques de conversion, d’UX et de responsive. Une première expérience dans un rôle similaire est un plus. 

Premier call avec l'équipe RH

Entretien dans les bureaux

Case study
